name: Isfunn: Viking Archaeology
description:
As glaciers in southern Norway melt at unprecedented rates due to climate change, archaeologists race against time to save precious Viking cultural artifacts as they melt out of the ice. 

Step into an archaeologist's shoes and join the quest - you might even glimpse a Norse god or two in the process!

Story designers: Cedric Legentil, Sera Jakob, Christina Moir, Kai Jacobs

Script: Cedric Lengentil

Programmer: Christina Moir

Artist: Kai Jacobs

Music composer/sound designer: Sera Jakob

Project manager: Sera Jakob

We give our thanks to Lars Holger Pilø, PhD, for assistance with archaeological and historical context
